title: The Forgotten Ghosts Return
outcome: Residents previously disappeared from watchlists suddenly return, bringing rumors and partial evidence of past BCI abuses. Their presence sparks public outrage, investigation, and further destabilization of Council authority.

events.description: Several vanished residents reappear in their neighborhoods, refusing to explain their absence and demanding reinstatement of housing and rights.
Stories of secret detention and BCI misclassification spread wildly. Leaked documents from the returned spark widespread anger and spontaneous rallies.
Council initiates a hurried review into old BCI enforcement errors, but infighting over responsibility leads to contradictory public statements.
Demonstrators converge on Council offices. Demands include amnesty for the returned and full disclosure of Halden's actions, putting Council under unprecedented pressure.
